text: - I'm Vinay Mehta,
and I'm the CTO at Smarsh.

on our industry right now.
Our first and best use case is compliance.

It's about, you know,
how do you get insights
from all the communication data

Now financial institutions
look at this information,
and using GenAI techniques,
we are finding new

extracting value from it.

compliance teams are finding,

and it does not has
all the logic reasoning
all finished out yet.

the due that we think

We balance security,
